prompt: Generate a 1000 word long story for the population that is growing in Mars. In 2040 first Mars mission was successfully completed after sending 100 people. They have started labs to generate Oxygen and there have been fortunate reports of several new borns as well. This cohort of first 100 people will continue to populate and conduct research to improve the life on Earth. They have already established highspeed networking with Earth and they are sending information to boost scientific development on Eath.
title: Martian Pioneers: New Horizons
